bsdhistory.text: #BSDHistory : Since May 8, 2015, #HardenedBSD project teamed up with #OPNsense to provide a custom distribution
#BSDHistory : #OPNsense name is derived from open and sense and stands for: 'Open (source) makes sense.'
#BSDHistory : #OPNsense is a fork of #pfSense that in its turn has been forked from #m0n0wall
